name: @elm-land/graphql
description: Generate Elm code from GraphQL files

scripts.build:playground: npm run build && (cd playground && elm-land graphql build)
scripts.test:setup: npm install && npm run build && npm run cli:setup
scripts.cli:setup: (cd ../cli && npm i && npm run setup && npm link)
scripts.example: (npm run build > /dev/null && echo '  âœ” Compiled Elm worker') && (cd "examples/$npm_config_name" && elm-land graphql build && elm make src/Main.elm --output=/dev/null)
